text: @vanOnselenP @Lindycleeland Put it in the same basket as @ScottMorrisonMP’s refusal to allocate the $550 Coronavirus supplement all other Centrelink recipients are receiving - the disabled and their carers are receiving $0 and the govt won’t even address the issue #raisethedsp
